page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: The Reverend Cummings has been a Rector for 34yrs,12 of which have been in Mil- ton and Collingtree.He decided to be a Rector in 1951.He was 32yrs old.Collin- gtree church is dedicated to St Columba and MiltonÂ£s church to St Helen. The churches are made of Limestone, Sandstone and ironstone.Parts of Collingtree and Milton churches are 885yrs old.The Rector enjoys his job Rector has done 195 funerals, 63 weddings and 113 christenings.The Rectors old job was a Civil Engineer. At the end of the High Street,there used to be a Methodist Chapel in Col- lingtree.It is now a private dwelling. It ceased to be used just before the 1st World War.The Rector is also Rector of Courteenhall church.He does 3 churches altogether.
